review: Easy to use. A little more than I expected as far as menu options. Blows away my Apple TV.

review: Very simple to install and use.  I was not aware the voice command only works with Amazon programs but that is not really a problem, just something I would have liked to have been aware of when purchasing.

review: Good value.  A little time consuming to find the movies you like, using the basic stick.  But that's OK.
